Reviews.Title: “Nice staff but very poorly managed”
Reviews.Author: Keith S
Reviews.Content: staff nice poorly trained charged sorts external laundry internet cards paid cas charged wife stayed 6 nights charged 8 nights tip day bar downstairs smokey expensive road docks bar ramada nice reasonable priced food drinks cheaper hotel boston bar rotana irish theme happy hour day 8 pm stay

Reviews.Title: “Not as bad as these reviews make out”
Reviews.Author: MikeJefferies
Reviews.Content: ive stayed times id struggle call bad ive issue hot water clean heard disco downstairs breakfast ok theres choice westerner theres mall 10 minutes walk carrefour supermarket chinese restaurant downstairs theres fitness top floor couple treadmills step machine etc warm water bottle

Reviews.Title: “Price is reasonable but it is not 4 star hotel”
Reviews.Author: Mahsa_USA
Reviews.Content: stayed capital hotel jan 2012 10 people staffs polite silly mistakes example 3 times send fix bath hot water 4 days body hot water bathroom warm shower booking airport transfer 10 am 10 pm 10 pm shift changed booking person charge service called taxi try lost time waiting disco sound flour makes sleep till 3 am ready breakfast clean metro station taxi 1013 aed

Reviews.Title: “Good night club's and restaurants”
Reviews.Author: aetos1
Reviews.Content: excellent hotel hotel hotel cool night clubs restaurants provides opportunity nights savage garden latin american tavern club russian night club lebanese restaurant imperial garden chinese restaurant provide dinners mini bar bathroom clean internet connection fast expensive hotel busines trip logical prices

Reviews.Title: “do not stay here!”
Reviews.Author: yobled30
Reviews.Content: stay sleep night hotel features 2 night clubs ground floor extremely loud dancing top floor hotel 4 star neither structure nor service staff polite thats extra effort silly mistakes daily hotel advertises internet availability cheap pool tiny location poor deal definitly single looking fun night sleep day

Reviews.Title: “Loud music keeps you awake”
Reviews.Author: KateDavy
Reviews.Content: favourite hotels cheap friendly am stop staying music loud 11pm till 3am kept awake music bollywood club repeated complaints front desk help avoid costs
